djc:cleardata.description: Delete data from a scratch org.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

sobject.name: sobject
sobject.description: Object to delete all records for

djc:export.description: Import data to an org to use in a scratch org.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

djc:import.description: Import data to an org to use in a scratch org.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

xfiles.name: xfiles
xfiles.description: Use the limited size files instead of full size files

tohoom:data:export.description: Extract data from an org to use in a scratch org. Just supply a list of SObjects and you *should* end up with a dataset and data plan that can be used with the official force:data:tree:import command

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

objects.name: objects
objects.description: Comma separated list of objects to fetch

planname.name: planname
planname.description: name of the data plan to produce, deflaults to "new-plan"

targetdir.name: targetdir
targetdir.description: target directoy to place results in

maxrecords.name: maxrecords
maxrecords.description: Max number of records to return in any query

spiderreferences.name: spiderreferences
spiderreferences.description: Include refereced SObjects determined by schema examination and existing data

enforcereferences.name: enforcereferences
enforcereferences.description: If present, missing child reference cause the record to be deleted, otherwise, just the reference field is removed

preserveobjectorder.name: preserveobjectorder
preserveobjectorder.description: If present, uses the order of the objects from the command to determine plan order

tohoom.name: tohoom
tohoom.description: Special Tohoom processing to handle self referential relationship

tohoom:data:split.description: Extract data from an org to use in a scratch org. Just supply a list of SObjects and you *should* end up with a dataset and data plan that can be used with the official force:data:tree:import command

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

planname.name: planname
planname.description: name of the data plan to use with split
